A dog walking and pet drop in service offering caring and enriching pet care in Cookridge, Tinshill and the surrounding areas.

What is a sniffari?

It is a sniff safari!

A dog walk where your pup leads, sniffing and exploring at their own pace. Tapping into a dog’s natural behaviours and satisfies their curiosity, keeping them happy, relaxed, and mentally enriched.

Hover over the icons to find out more

Tap the icons to find out more

Bonding Time

Sniffaris allow you to see the world from their perspective and can strengthen the bond you share by supporting their natural instincts.

Improved Behaviour

Allowing dogs the freedom to explore can help with behaviour, as they’re less likely to act out due to boredom or frustration.

Mental Stimulation

Sniffing engages a dog’s mind, giving them something mentally enriching to focus on, which can be just as tiring as physical exercise.

Physical Exercise

While not the same as a long run, wandering and stopping to sniff still offers some level of physical movement, which can be beneficial for low-energy or senior dogs.

Stress Relief

Exploring and sniffing new smells helps a dog relax and reduces stress by fulfilling their natural desire to investigate the world through scent.
